location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Accompaniment to Report by Mr. H. Armstrong on the Preliminary Survey of the Route for a Telegraph Line from Quetta to the Persian Frontier.’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 316 x 506mm, on sheet 387 x 579mm

mods.abstract: The map shows parts of countries including Iraq, Persia [Iran], and Afghanistan, the region of Baluchistan [Balochistan], the Persian Gulf, and the Northern coastline of the Arabian Sea. The route of a proposed telegraph line from Quetta to Ladis and Koh-i-Malik Seah is indicated with a red line.The map includes some indication of relief, in the form of hachures for volcanoes and mountains.
